Description:
A Spacious Family Home Surrounded by Landscaped Gardens
This ideally located, solid brick home is perfect for any growing family, first home buyer or investor alike. Within close walking distance of Dorothy Street shopping strip, as well as close proximity to the medical centre, schools, convenient public transport and only a 7-minute drive to Geelong CBD.
Nestled upon 847m2, the home is elevated and set back behind establish garden bed and offers a very private lifestyle. On entrance, be greeted by solid timber polished boards which flow into the formal lounge with split system cooling, gas heater and floor to ceiling windows overlooking the expansive gardens. Walking through from lounge to the formal dining room which steps out to the rear outdoor entertaining area.
The updated and contemporary kitchen comprises ample storage and bench space with new appliances including; electric cooking, dishwasher and dual sinks with low line benched and breakfast bar.
The home offers 4 generous sized bedrooms all with built in robes and solid timber floors. The main entertains a fully updated ensuite with toilet, vanity and shower.
The central bathroom, also updated, offers an abundance of space for the kids. Featuring bath, shower, vanity and plenty of under sink storage.
The real draw card for this home is without a doubt the rear landscaped yards, overflowing with various beds wrapped around a raised circular grass pad. It really is a beautiful treasure. Additional features include: water tank, double enclosed carport, plenty of off-street car parking, separate living zones, undercover alfresco area and garden shed.
This property offers a fantastic opportunity for today and years to come.

Description:
A great opportunity to invest in a Leopold lifestyle.
This neat block in the heart of Leopold is a subdivision with its own separate approved title.
Ideally located in a quiet street, just 2 minutes walk to the Ash Road shops and 2km to the Gateway Plaza shopping centre, schools and sporting facilities. The opportunity to create your own home in this central and established location awaits you.
A two-storey townhouse (STCA) would certainly enjoy the benefit of elevated views towards the bay and Geelong, and its position provides easy access to coastal towns on the Bellarine, the Surf Coast and the Great Ocean Road.
With Geelong just fifteen minutes and Melbourne just over an hour's drive away, Leopold has an ideal lifestyle that combines the best of rural and coastal living.
- Neat subdivison block in Leopold with approved title
- Potential for townhouse (STCA) with elevated coastal views
- 2 minute walk to Ash Road shops
- Easy access to Bellarine, Surf Coast, and Great Ocean Road
- Fifteen minutes to Geelong - just an hour to Melbourne
- Enjoy a lifestyle that combines the best of rural and coastal.

Description:
SPACIOUS AND MODERN HOME
Featuring a modern design and functional floorplan with three living zones and four bedrooms including Master with ensuite, this home offers an abundance of space and privacy for the growing family. Situated in the thriving seaside town of Clifton Springs on approx 630m2 parcel of land with Golf Course, Bowls Club and pristine beaches all in close proximity, this home offers easy low maintenance living allowing you more time to enjoy the beautiful Bellarine Peninsula with excellent schools, award winning wineries and fantastic fishing all on offer! This fabulous home further comprises ducted heating and split system plus new blinds and carpets leaving you nothing more to do but move in, or alternatively a fantastic investment opportunity.

Description:
Perfectly zoned, contemporary family lifestyle.
This home presents a rare opportunity for growing families to enjoy a lavish lifestyle, located close to Leopold Primary School, with multiple living zones and four spacious bedrooms all set on a huge 1,066sqm (approx) block of land.
This magnificent home greets you with a grand entry way featuring a large open-plan formal lounge with gas heating and dining space for you and your guests. An oversized open-plan living/meals area and a spacious updated kitchen with finishes such as a dishwasher & brand new stove & oven with plenty of bench space for those who love to cook. Four spacious bedrooms, three with built-in robes and the master suite with walk-in robe and sizeable ensuite that features a single vanity and shower.
Step outside into the rear yard and you will be amazed by the beautiful ambience of the manicured gardens. A great sized undercover alfresco is an added bonus perfect for those summer night barbeques. Other features of the home include double car remote garage, 2 water tanks, ample storage throughout, solar panels and ducted heating & evaporate cooling. With the added convenience of public transport close by, Leopold football and netball club a short walk away and all major amenities within easy reach, what more could you ask for? Call to enquire today.

Description:
Exceptional Home, Ideal Location!
Meticulous street appeal, natural tones throughout and a convenient floorplan is just some of which this modern, low maintenance family home has to offer. It is sure to impress the savvy investor, growing family or first home buyer looking to secure an ultimate location. The property is nestled on 513m2 allotment in a quiet, low traffic, family friendly street, within close proximity to Leopolds Gateway plaza, schools, and with the rear yard backing onto the popular Bellarine rail trail.
This home has been fastidiously maintained and comprises three generous sized bedrooms. Main bedroom located at the back of the home and offers walk through robes and private ensuite, while remaining bedrooms have built in robes and utilise the central bathroom and separate toilet.
The well-designed kitchen has all the modern conveniences you could need. Offering stainless steel appliances, gas cook top, built in oven, dishwasher, stone benchtops, step in pantry and is open plan to the light filled dining and living zone. The second separate living area is located at the front of the home and with a large study and laundry completing the internal spaces of the home.
Ducted heating & reverse cycle split system control the climate all year round.
Opening from the dining area through glass sliders, an undercover entertaining space weather protected by café blinds. Enjoy the summer nights in this space while overlooking the well-kept, low maintenance rear yard. The double remote garage has internal access completing this impressive family home.

Description:
Leopolds best buy! Quality built home on 936sqm in a quiet court locale
Nestled in a quiet court location, this gorgeous 3-bedroom, 2 bathroom, 2 living zone home with DLUG provides for the ultimate in lifestyle located only minutes from Shopping Centre, Medical facilities and schools. With side access for boats or caravans this will appeal to those who like to enjoy the outdoors and have leisure craft to store off the street and want a larger than usual block. At approximately 936m2 these properties are rare to the market. The fantastic easy living layout has a generous master bedroom with ensuite and walk in robe at the front of the home. Opposite is the formal lounge with a lovely brick feature wall. Beyond this is the large open plan kitchen, living and dining. This area is tiled and has a fully renovated kitchen which looks stunning and has an abundance of cupboard and drawer space. From here it's easy access to the large outdoor undercover space with built in Barbeque. This is an ideal space for large family gatherings and is next to the large rear yard with low maintenance garden and lawn area which would be ideal for children to play safely. The remaining 2 bedrooms are at the rear of the home and are serviced by a newly renovated central bathroom. Extra features include ceiling fans, S/S heating and cooling, gas wall heater, double remote lock up garage with drive through access to the rear of the home and garden shed. Location is key with this property - in a quiet crt location and close to all amenities. With a neutral colour palette and quality finishes and fixtures this home will be ticking all the boxes. Seize the opportunity to secure this absolutely ideal home which offers all of the elements of the ultimate in lifestyle.

Description:
Unique Design on 700+ M2
If you are looking for something a little different, on the unique side with a sizeable parcel and located in a sought-after Leopold pocket then 23 Hannan Crescent may just be the home for you.
This tidy package is situated upon approximately 742m2 of manicured front and back gardens offering plenty of room to move and further improve if you wanted to. This unique design oozes an air of splendor, pillars, bulk heads and lit niche boxes throughout the home coupled with the unique floor plan will certainly catch your interest.
The timeless grand façade and vast front yard welcomes you to a warm and inviting atmosphere comprising 4 bedrooms, the master with a walk-in robe and ensuite and the remaining 3 bedrooms with built-in-robes. Internal entry from the garage, laundry with access to the yard and a central bathroom with corner spa and separate toilet. Step down into the sunken living area before flowing into the open plan kitchen and dining area. A beautiful timber kitchen with plenty of cupboards and bench space complete with NEFF Hide and Slide electric oven and gas stove top. Sliding doors out to the undercover alfresco area surrounded by lush screening and plenty of room to move.
Features of the home include ducted heating, split system heating and cooling, ceiling fans, garden sheds, double lock up garage with remote entry, quality fittings and fixtures.
Located within proximity to schools, public transport and the expansive Gateway Plaza not to mention a short drive to the Geelong City and the best of the Bellarine Peninsula.

Description:
Modern Family Living at its Best
Designed to meet the needs of a growing family, this home offers the ultimate luxury living and maximized space, where no expense has been spared. This spacious, light filled and immaculately presented home in the much sought-after Estuary Estate is a delight to inspect.
Offering a cleverly designed floorplan to maximize functionality. Comprising four generously proportioned bedrooms, main bedroom with private ensuite, walk in robe, as well as extra built in robes. A central bathroom services the remaining bedrooms including shower, bath, vanity and separate toilet. The open plan kitchen, dining and living zone is bathed in natural sunlight. The kitchen boasts a large island bench, 900mm stainless steel oven, dishwasher and large walk in pantry. Completing the floorplan inside is a second separate lounge area, open study and a sizeable laundry offering storage and easy access to the rear yard.
Positioned on an allotment of approximately 523m2. Outdoors offers an undercover entertaining area with additional decking space, making indoor outdoor living easy. The spacious yard features beautiful gardens, an abundance of space for kids and pets to enjoy.
Added extras include ducted heating, ceiling fans and a security system. The location enjoys easy access to the expanded Gateway Shopping Plaza, local primary school and medical facilities. The Geelong CBD and all that the Bellarine Peninsula has to offer are only a short fifteen-minute drive away.
This is the perfect home for your family to grow into with comfort and style.

Description:
Great backyard, great house, great location

Master bedroom with a modern ensuite including a frameless, doorless tiled shower.
The second & third bedrooms located in a separate passageway serviced by the central bathroom .
In floor central heating.
Split system heating/cooling.
Carport sheltering the entryway.
Barn door style 10m x 5m colourbond garage with 3 phase, motion sensor alarm, perfect for the tradies.
Backyard is fully landscaped with low maintenance trees and shrubs.
Set on a generous allotment, approx. 839 sqm and just minutes to the picturesque Clifton Springs Golf Course safe boat harbour, schools, transport and excellent shopping centres.

Just a short drive to the Dell, Golf & Bowls club, boat ramp, local schools, shopping centre, medical facilities & local schools. Description:
Private, Quiet and Central
Life will be a breeze in this entry level unit located less than 400m (approx.) from the retail hub of Drysdale's town centre. With all amenities within walking distance, this two-bedroom unit is the perfect 'downsizer' or ideal for those looking to enter the Drysdale property market.
The open-plan kitchen/living/dining area provides a beautiful centrepiece for this light-filled home. The kitchen boasts a huge walk-in-pantry, stainless-steel appliances and ample storage and bench space. The home is heated by ducted-gas heating and cooled by evaporative cooling ensuring comfort in even the most extreme weather.
The master bedroom features an ensuite and both bedrooms contain built-in-robes. The second bedroom is serviced by conveniently located bathroom.
Externally the home features a single lock-up garage and a beautiful decked alfresco area, which is protected and fully enclosed - providing the perfect quiet retreat to enjoy a Summer's day.
Short walk to shops, health and medical centres.
Located at the back of a complex of five units you are guaranteed some quiet time in this 2009 built unit!

Description:
Stellar Starter, Ideal Investment!
Oozing with charm, this bay side abode offers more than meets the eye. Perfectly positioned in a private tucked away pocket and only an 8-minute stroll to the boat ramp and water's edge, this is your opportunity to secure your piece of paradise!
The perfect start for first home buyers, a low maintenance investment or holiday home, a multitude of opportunities are on offer. Perfect as is, but with room for you to add your own mark, your imagination will run wild! First impressions count, as established ornamental pears line the front garden, which also offers a high fence and secure front gates. Upon entry to the home, you're greeted by a separate lounge area, which flows into the main hub of the home, equipped with 2nd living, spacious kitchen with 900ml 5 burner gas cooking, dishwasher and storage, all while overlooking the meals area with split system heating and cooling. A versatile 4th bedroom/study complete the fore of the home, before 3 spacious bedrooms, 2 with built-in-robes sit from the central rear wing, this area complete with the fully equipped bathroom, separate toilet and laundry.
A serene and tranquil feel, the back garden offers an expansive undercover deck which lead you down to an open grassed area with more than enough open space for children and pets alike! With an array of storage options for all the toys, a double car port leads you through to the rear DLUG, with plenty of space for multiple cars, the boat, caravan and anything imaginable!
Location is key and this package offers it all! The boat ramp, golf club, shops, public transport, kindergarten and primary school are all within a short walk, with all further major amenities at your fingertips. Don't miss this opportunity!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
PRIME LIFESTYLE POSITION
Located only a few minutes from the water and local golf club precinct with public transport nearby. Pop in to the various wineries and cafes located only a short drive away or jump on the Port Phillip Ferry for a day in the city. This lovely home was constructed by the current vendors and has been meticulously maintained. This is a walkin and unpack all complete package !
Attention to detail can be observed throughout this outstanding four bedroom, two bathroom home. Spotless floor coverings, modern tonings, renovated modern kitchen with stone bench tops and quality European appliances, top quality window furnishings and much more. Central heating and cooling throughout the home for your comfort.
Beautiful timber shutters control abundant light filtering into the home.
Picture perfect gardens manicured to perfection surround the property creating a tranquil outdoor area where the sound of the trickling water can be heard as you relax by the barbecue.
The double garage plus undercover for one more gives plenty of parking options.
Water tanks 2 x 4500lts & 1 x 2270 lts for wc , 3kW Solar Panels
Private inspections only

Description:
A Hidden Sanctuary With Lake Frontage!
Dont miss this rare opportunity to secure a private lakeside property upon approx. 3.85 acres! Nestled amongst landscaped grounds, this residence comes hand-in-hand with an enviable lifestyle!
With direct access to Lake Connewarre, you can enjoy a tranquil lifestyle every day of the week. Bird life is in abundance and include, Straw-necked Ibis, Yellow-billed Spoonbills, Pelicans, Ducks, Caspian Terns, Cormorant and resident Swans to name a few.
With the tidal lake granting access to the Barwon River, why not canoe or kayak to Barwon Heads for a leisurely lunch? The conveniences of Leopold are only a short drive away, including the Gateway Plaza and Leopold Primary School. The Bellarine Highway provides easy access to the delights of Geelong and the Bellarine Peninsula.
The concrete driveway leads down to the home, where the feeling of privacy is absolute. Inside, youll love that the picturesque landscape is captured through every window.
With uninterrupted lake views, the open plan living/dining/kitchen zone creates a wealth of space for everyday living. The kitchen takes care of all your cooking needs with a walk-in pantry, black SMEG dishwasher, and Kleenmaid cooking appliances (oven, electric cooktop, rangehood). The generous lounge is graced with an electric fireplace for those cosy winter nights.
Entertainers will be in their element with all living zones uniting with the expansive outdoor entertaining room. No matter the season, this stunning area will effortlessly accommodate your plans - open the doors onto the lush lawns during summer or close the doors for protection during winter! The sun-drenched alfresco provides yet another spot to pop up your feet and relax.
The Master Bedroom will delight parents with walk-in robe, en suite, and a separate toilet. Bedroom Two also boasts an en suite and built-in robes, along with a separate entrance that makes it ideal for those who enjoy their independence.
Two additional bedrooms with built-in robes, versatile 5th bedroom/study, main bathroom, separate toilet, and laundry complete the layout.
Youll be in comfort all year long thanks to six split-system air conditioners, electric heaters to all bedrooms, and ceiling fans throughout. Other features include double-glazed windows, CCTV security system, internal and external alarm system, and a remote-controlled front gate.
Home to three secure paddocks and established trees, the grounds create a private wonderland for children and adults alike. A variety of fruit trees invite you to enjoy almonds, nectarines, apricots, and apples straight from the source. And with seven self-shedding sheep coming with the property, your paddock is taken care of!
The carport provides parking for four vehicles, while the large work shed accommodates two vehicles plus a generous workshop area. The property also offers plenty of parking for caravans, boats, trailers, or other equipment.
Promising an exclusive lifestyle of privacy and serenity, this property is truly one of a kind! Inspection will impress!

Description:
Serene Estate
A lifestyle opportunity enabling you to thrive and prosper in an intimate residential estate. Residing in this enviable location offers a lifestyle of coastal living, the convenience of a large regional centre within a 20 minute drive and designed around a semi rural, close knit community with every convenience at your doorstep.
The peninsula location is renowned for the idyllic, outdoor lifestyle. Spend a day at the beach, go fishing or enjoy a glass of your favourite wine at one of our many local wineries. The Port Phillip Ferry sails twice daily from Portarlington to South Bank if you fancy a day trip to the city. You will ask yourself why you didn't make the move sooner.
Ground works to commence late 2018.
Selling fast, contact Rhonda Humpage 0457 313609

Description:
Immaculate family home with beautiful backyard.
Situated in quiet neighbourhood, in a well-established pocket of Leopold, this meticulously maintained home is surrounded by beautiful gardens and offers a great blend of convenience, functionality and quality. Comprising 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, a light-filled kitchen living and dining area, adjoining sun-room, alfresco and an easy maintenance pool, this property is perfect for families or even older couples and is on the market just in time for summer.
On entry, a large formal lounge and dining room greets you as you walk down the wide hallway through to the open plan kitchen and living. The renovated kitchen offers plentiful storage, new appliances and overlooks the stunning pool area.
A fully enclosed sunroom and adjoining alfresco provides a perfect place to entertain and is accompanied by the low-maintenance pool with self-cleaning jets and included umbrella shade. Manicured gardens and lawns lead the way around the back of the home to a paved courtyard which is home to a veggie garden, garden shed and washing line all out of sight when guests are enjoying the blissful backyard.
Accommodation includes a large master bedroom with ceiling fan, walk-in robe and renovated ensuite. Bedrooms 2 and 3 offer built in robes and ceiling fans and are serviced by a central bathroom with separate toilet.
Notable features include:
- Ducted heating.
- Split system A/C in both living areas.
- 20 panel Solar PV system with battery.
- Double garage currently used as a single garage plus home office.
- Garden shed.
- Water tank.
- Built in ironing board.
Located within 5 minutes of Leopolds Gateway Plaza, just 15 minutes to the Geelong Waterfront, 10 minutes to the Bellarine Peninsula, and with easy access to some of Geelongs finest schools, this feature-packed property showcases the superior blend of convenience, practicality, outdoor living, in one of Geelongs most popular suburbs. Enquire today!

The spacious living area opens out to a north-facing undercover entertainment area which is surrounded by manicured gardens and paved walkways.

Description:
A World Of Possibilities Await In Leopold!
Set upon approx. 1 acre, this property promises a unique opportunity in a quiet pocket of Leopold! Occupied by two self-contained residences and an expansive work shed, a world of possibilities are on offer! Whether youre living with family members who enjoy their independence, planning to lease out one of the residences, or youre a tradie looking for a great work shed, this home will impress!
Public transport and the Canowindra Reserve are a short stroll away. Leopold Primary School is within easy reach, along with the Leopold Community Hub and Leopold Library. A short drive will find you at the Gateway Plaza, while the Bellarine Highway grants easy access to both Geelong and the Bellarine Peninsula.
An entrance welcomes you into the home, which then splits into the two residences meaning that both homes enjoy full independence while still being connected.
The main residence offers a spacious layout and superb entertaining options. The open plan living zone flows through to the rumpus room, which then unites with the light-filled outdoor entertaining room. With all zones opening onto the large alfresco and outdoor area, youll love that this seamless indoor-outdoor connection makes entertaining a breeze! Graced with bay windows, the generous lounge inspires you to sit back and relax.
The kitchen exudes quality with stone waterfall benchtops, a butlers pantry, and stainless steel appliances (Westinghouse dishwasher and SMEG 900mm oven, gas hob, rangehood).
The spacious Master Bedroom features a dual walk-in robe and en suite with in-situ shower, single vanity, and toilet. Two large bedrooms with built-in robes are tucked away in a separate wing, along with the man bathroom and separate toilet.
Modcons include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, and ducted vacuum. The remote double lock-up garage features internal access.
In the second residence, the open plan living/dining/kitchen zone creates the heart of the home, while generous proportions are featured throughout for easy wheelchair access. The Master Bedroom will delight with a walk-in robe, direct bathroom access, and private courtyard. Bedroom Two is complete with built-in robes and opens onto the alfresco. The generous bathroom features a spa bath, large in-situ shower, single vanity, and toilet. Youll be in comfort all year long thanks to ducted heating and a split-system air conditioner. The remote single lock-up garage with internal access provides parking.
The laundry and powder room complete the overall layout.
The expansive grounds are home to ample rainwater storage with a sprinkler system, chook pen, and garden shed.
The work shed provides parking for three vehicles, plus ample room for a workshop. Featuring two tall roller doors and pitched roof, this is an ideal space for storing boats, caravans, trailers, or work equipment. A secure area leading to the work shed provides an abundance of space for storing additional vehicles.
Offering space and immense versatility, inspection is a must to see first-hand what this home has to offer!

Description:
UNDER CONTRACT
Nestled in amongst Wallingtons beautiful rural landscape yet only 5 minutes to Ocean Groves main surf beach, this timber cottage is truly a rare find. On 927m2 of land (approx.) this allotment was once part of a larger land holding that has since been subdivided.
This charming, three - bedroom home offers the astute buyer a chance to acquire a property in a much sought-after pocket of Wallington without having to buy acreage, yet still have room to move.
With old world charm, the cottage is brimming with potential. Working within the existing bones of the property or renovating (STCA) the choices are endless to add your personal touches all enabling you to sit back and enjoy the rural vista that surrounds you. Providing 3 bedrooms, main with ensuite, separate lounge room, open plan kitchen and dining opening via French doors to an alfresco deck bathed in sunlight, ideal for BBQs and Gin and Tonics. There is a family bathroom and a further deck area at the rear of the house. The rear garden is vast and a blank canvas for veggie gardens, chooks etc. A storage shed is an additional bonus for the gardening enthusiast.
This property is zoned and within easy reach of the highly regarded Wallington Primary School, and the local café The Paddock, is only a short walk up away, as is Lomas Orchards where you can pick your own strawberries. For those with riding interests Koombahla Park is super close by and offers agistment opportunities. All in all, this gem of a property will be highly sought after.
